ygData.subject: RE: HER-2070 or: Any news on the Cookie Monster bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Just wanted to follow up on Roger s e-mail from earlier this week. The bug he mentions (HER-2070, or Cookie Monster as I prefer to think of it) was
